want to change the TEST to TEST_F or move it to another test

content.raw:
When I spawn a sphere outside of the elevator, the door will stay open for a while, close, and then open immediately. It completes this cycle for a while. The same behavior is seen when the object is in the elevator's doorway, which means that the elevator will sometimes close on the sphere.

When a sphere is inside of the elevator and I spawn another sphere on the upper floor, the elevator doesn't move up to the first floor.
content.html:
When I spawn a sphere outside of the elevator, the door will stay open for a while, close, and then open immediately. It completes this cycle for a while. The same behavior is seen when the object is in the elevator's doorway, which means that the elevator will sometimes close on the sphere.

When a sphere is inside of the elevator and I spawn another sphere on the upper floor, the elevator doesn't move up to the first floor.

content.raw:
The first behavior is correct. 

The elevator should move with an object in it. Checking now.
